bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Ethernet Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for Greater Than 1 Gb/s Automotive Ethernet
IEEE Draft Standard for Ethernet Physical Layer Specifications and Management Parameters for Greater Than 1 Gb/s Automotive Ethernet

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2018 adds physical layer specifications and management parameters for 2.5 Gb/s, 5 Gb/s, and 10 Gb/s operation on a single balanced pair of conductors suitable for automotive applications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: 2.5GBASE-T1; 5GBASE-T1; 10GBASE-T1; Ethernet; IEEE 802.3ch; MASTER-SLAVE; Medium Dependent Interface; Physical Coding Sublayer; Physical Layer; Physical Medium Attachment
